DOC.brief_summary: Slow release iron capsule contain ferrous sulfate design base gastric delivery system . Iron absorption capsule administer without meal measure use stable iron isotope .
DOC.brief_title: Iron Absorption From GDS Capsules II
DOC.criteria: female , age 1850 year , max . body weight 65 kg , serum ferritin < 30 Âµg/l pregnancy , lactation , regular intake medication , blood donation significant blood loss past 4 month
